Writer: Peter Fonda, Dennis Hopper, Terry Southern
Title: Easy Rider
Actors: Peter Fonda, Dennis Hopper, Antonio Mendoza, Phil Spector
Plot: Through the open country and desert lands, two bikers head from L.A to New Orleans, and along the way, meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap they are unaware of.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 12 nominations.
